root.name: Crash Bandicoot 2: N-Tranced
root.description: Levels There are 24 levels in Crash Bandicoot 2: N-Tranced. There are 6 available at the start and new sets of levels are unlocked as the prior set's Boss Level is completed. Trance Wild Nile Ride101 Arabian KitesFire WalkerBoss Level: N. Tropy
